verses.roman:
sa eva vā bhaven nūnaṁ
yo me garbhe dhṛto 'rbhakaḥ
amuṣmin prītir adhikā
vāmaḥ sphurati me bhujaḥ

synonyms: saḥ—He; eva—indeed; vā—or else; bhavet—must be; nūnam—for certain; yaḥ—who; me—my; garbhe—in the womb; dhṛtaḥ—was carried; arbhakaḥ—child; amuṣmin—for Him; prītiḥ—affection; adhikā—great; vāmaḥ—left; sphurati—trembles; me—my; bhujaḥ—arm.
translation: Yes, He must be the same child I bore in my womb, since I feel great affection for Him and my left arm is quivering.
